widgets.description: Track the number of followers for any Twitter user.

request.filter: #overview > div.row > div:nth-child(4) > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(2)

widgets.helpText: Specify username for the user you want to track the number of followers for.

widgets.description: Track the number of followers for any Instagram user.
widgets.helpText: Specify username for the user you want to track the number of followers for.

widgets.description: Track the number of subscribers for any YouTube channel.

widgets.description: Track the number of followers for any GitHub user.

widgets.description: Track the number of watchers for any public GitHub repo.
widgets.helpText: Specify owner and repo for the repository you want to track the number of watchers for.

Track any exchange rate published by the European Central Bank.
widgets.helpText: Specify three-letter codes for the currencies you want to track the exchange rate for. Supported currencies are USD, EUR, JPY, GBP, AUD, CAD, CHF, HKD, NZD, ISK, PHP, DKK, HUF, CZK, RON, SEK, IDR, INR, BRL, RUB, HRK, THB, MYR, BGN, TRY, CNY, NOK, ZAR, MXN, SGD, ILS, KRW, PLN.
